title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
I thought the SMC would be causing the issue with the charger light not showing at all and the PPBUS_G3H not boosting. Changing twice neither have changed I think I reballed a couple of those SMC's more than once to no avail. The fact that I have PPBUS G3H at 12.25 and no charger light should imply the SMC, correct?

SMC's did come from other 3115 boards. One of the donor boards I pulled SMC from was known to boot but had other strange issue I couldn't resolve.

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
Did you check first voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus???
Did you test the board alone on the desk?

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message: Voltage on PP3V42_G3H, SMC_RESET_L and PP3V3_S5_SMC_VDDA?

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
Tested on desk.
Diode on battery bus lines is .527 and .526
3.49V with charger only at pins 4 and 6  J6950

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
Did you try another DCIN board?
Post U6900/01 voltages.
Check continuity from U6900 to central pin of Magsafe connector.
There should be a 20 ohms resistor, or just a small coil, in series.

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
YEs tried a couple different DCIN boards.
+3V at pins1,4,5 of U6900 and 1,2,4,5 of u6901
22 ohms from pin 5 U6900 to center pin of MS connector.

title: 820-3115 No charger light, PPBUS G3H is 12.25, CHanged SMC twice after reflow.
message:
Looks like you have SMC issue.
Checl ALL signals and voltages for U4900 (2 OF 2) at page 45.
Be sure to get oscillation at Y5010.
